channel.title: admin on Dominic J. Bennett
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Dominic J. Bennett

item.description: I’m a post-doc in the Antonelli Lab at the University of Gothenburg, Sweden, working on pipelines in R for phylogenetic analysis. As part of this work I’m converting the program SUPERSMART to R, a project called “supersmartR”. Prior to this position, I did a PhD at Imperial College London and the Zoological Society of London where I attempted to re-appraise the “living fossil” concept. In my work, I particularly enjoy developing software and have created a range of R and python packages for munging and analysing biological data (from DNA to species records).
